hero.title: The Philippines needs rice - but young people don’t want to farm it
hero.description: Some 2.4 million Filipinos work as rice farmers. But for young people, a rice farmer’s grueling and often impoverished life holds dwindling appeal.

primary.lead: Muntinlupa Court Acquits de Lima from Final Drug Case
primary.title: Court dismisses De Lima’s last drug case
primary.description: Former senator Leila de Lima, an arch critic of the previous administration, has now been cleared of all the drug charges filed against her during the presidency of Rodrigo Duterte.

secondary.title: De Lima on acquittal: ‘I am vindicated’; says Duterte will be held accountable for ‘war on drugs’
secondary.description: Former senator Leila de Lima said she felt vindicated after the Muntinlupa Regional Trial Court (RTC) Branch 206 acquitted her in the last remaining drug case filed in 2017 under the Duterte administration.

secondary.title: Explainer: Why court acquitted Leila de Lima in last drug case
secondary.description: The court says the witnesses' testimonies were not enough to establish a drug trading conspiracy involving De Lima and her fellow accused

carousel.title: PISA results mirror PH education’s lost days, ‘grave crisis’
carousel.description: Manila, Philippines — While class suspensions are imperative, especially when disasters strike, the almost three months of learning that were lost in school year 2023-2024 are already “symptoms of the grave education crisis.”

carousel.title: Beyond the Prison Gates
carousel.description: Inmates or persons deprived of liberty are released frequently. But after spending time in detention, how do they pick up where they left off?

carousel.title: Years Later, Philippines Reckons With Duterte’s Brutal Drug War
carousel.description: A president’s vow to fight drugs unleashed violence and fostered a culture of impunity. But the crimes are finally getting a look, including from the International Criminal Court.

carousel.title: Bike advocates laud 'long overdue' active transport infrastructure in Intramuros
carousel.description: Advocates say the project enhances pedestrians and cyclists' safety and promotes heritage tourism
